definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: covenant (‖ Aram. [[קְיׇם]], diaqh/kh; constitutio)—´[[ב]] Ge 9:13 + 199 t.; sf. [[בְּרִיתִי]] Ge 6:18 + 50 t.; [[בְּרִיתְךָ]] De 33:9; [[בְּרִיתֶָךָ]] Ps 44:18 + 11 t.; [[בְּרִיתְכֶם]] Is 28:18; [[בְּרִיתֵךְ]] Ez Eze 16:61; [[בְּרִיתוֹ]] Ex 2:24 = 18 t.;—pact, compact, covenant.

definitions.title: I.
definitions.body: between men.

trety, alliance, league: Abraham and Amorites Ge 14:13; Edom and its allies Ob:Ob 7; with Philistines Ge 21:27, Ge 21:32 (E) Ge 26:28 (J); Jacob and Laban Ge 31:44 (J); Joshua and Gibeonites Jos 9:6, Jos 9:7, Jos 9:11, Jos 9:15, Jos 9:16 (J); Israel and Canaanites Ex 23:32, Ex 34:12, Ex 34:15 (JE) De 7:2, Ju Jdg 2:2; Ammonites and Jabesh 1Sa 11:1; Solomon and Hiram 1Ki 5:26; Ahab and Benhadad 1Ki 20:34; Syria and Israel 1Ki 15:19 = 2Ch 16:3; Nebuchadnezzar and Zedekiah Ez Eze 17:13-19; nations against Israel Ps 83:6; nations with Egypt Ez Eze 30:5; Ephraim and Assyria Ho 12:2; Judah and Israel Ez Eze 16:61; Judah and Tyre Am 1:9; Assyria and Judah Is 33:8; [[נגיד ברית]] a prince in league (with him) Da 11:22 (so He Ew; Hi Meinh Bev ref. to h. p. Onias III, & translate prince of cov't, cf. AV RV); fig., with death Is 28:15, Is 28:18; with stones of the field Job 5:23.

constitution, ordinance, between monarch and subjects: David and Abner 2Sa 3:12, 2Sa 3:13, 2Sa 3:21; David and the elders of Israel 2Sa 5:3 = 1Ch 11:3; Zedekiah and his people Je 34:8-18; hostile prince and Israelites Da 9:27.

agreement, pledge: Jehoiada and captains 2Ki 11:4 = 2Ch 23:1; with onself Job 31:1; with Leviathan to be a servant Job 40:28; between man and man Ho 10:4 cf. [[בעל ברית]] Ju Jdg 8:33, Jdg 9:4 = [[אל ברית]] Ju Jdg 9:46.
alliance of friendship between David and Jonathan 1Sa 18:3, 1Sa 20:8, 1Sa 23:18 cf. Ps 55:21.

alliance of marriage Pr 2:17, Mal 2:14.—In all cases [[כרת ברית]] is the technical phrase for making covenant except Je 34:10 [[באו בברית]]; Da 9:27 [[הגביר ברית לְ]]. Various preps. are used, most oft. [[לְ]] Ex 23:32 +, but also [[עִם]] Ge 26:28 +, [[אֵת]] 2Sa 3:12 +, [[בֵּין]] 2Ch 16:3.

definitions.title: II.
definitions.body: between God and man.
alliance of friendship (‖[[סוֹד]]) Ps 25:14.
covenant, as a divine constitution or ordinance with signs or pledges (vid. [[אוֹת]]).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: with Noah Ge 9:9-17 (P) Is 54:10, Je 33:20, Je 33:25; a divine promise that there would be no other deluge.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with Abraham, Isaac and Jacob Ge 15:18 (J) Ge 17:2-21, Ex 2:24, Ex 6:4, Ex 6:5, Le 26:42 (P) 2Ki 13:23, 1Ch 16:15 = Ps 105:8, Ps 105:10, Ne 9:8, Je 34:18; a promise to multiply their seed, give them the land of Canaan, and make them a blessing to the nations.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: with Israel at Sinai = Horeb, with a covenant sacrifice Ex 19:5, Ex 24:7, Ex 24:8 (E) Ex 34:10, Ex 34:27, Ex 34:28 (J) Ex 31:16, Le 2:13 (P) Le 24:8, Le 26:9, Le 26:15, Le 26:25, Le 26:44, Le 26:45 (H) De 4:13; renewed in plains of Moab De 28:69; with blessings and curses De 29:20; frequently referred to in other books 2Ch 34:32, Ps 25:10, Ps 44:18, Ps 50:5, Ps 50:16, Ps 74:20, Ps 78:10, Ps 78:37, Ps 103:18, Ps 106:45, Ps 111:5, Ps 111:9, Is 56:4, Is 56:6, Je 1:2, Je 1:3, Je 1:6, Je 1:8, Je 1:10, Je 14:21, Je 22:9, Je 31:32, Ez Eze 16:8, Eze 16:59, Eze 16:60, Eze 44:7, Da 9:4, Da 11:28, Da 11:30, Da 11:32, Ho 6:7, Ho 8:1, Zec 9:11, Zec 11:10; a divine constitution given to Israel with promises on condition of obedience and penalties for disobendience, in the form of tables of the covenant De 9:9, De 9:11, De 9:15, inscribed with the ten words, placed in (´[[י]])[[ארון ברית]] the ark of the covenant Nu 10:33 + 40 t. (vid. [[ארון]]; in 1Sa 4:3, 1Sa 4:4, 1Sa 4:4, 1Sa 4:5 om. [[ברית]] after [[ארון]] LXX We Dr); set forth in [[דברי הברית]] words of the covenant Ex 34:28 (J) De 28:69, De 29:8, 2Ki 23:3 (= 2Ch 34:31) Je 11:2-8; written in [[ספר הברית]] the book of the covenant Ex 24:7 (E. cf. Ex 34:27 J) 2Ki 23:2, 2Ki 23:21 (cf. 2Ch 34:30).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: with Phinehas Nu 25:12, Nu 25:13 (P), a constitution, establishing an everlasting priesthood in his line; cf. [[ברית הכהנים]] Ne 13:29 & [[ברית הלוי]] Mal 2:4, Mal 2:8.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: with Joshua and Israel Jos 24:25 (E), an ordinance or constitutional agreement to serve Yahweh only.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: with David Ps 89:4, Ps 89:29, Ps 89:34, Ps 89:39, Ps 132:12, Je 33:21 (cf. 2Sa 7 = 1Ch 17); a divine promise to the seed of David of an everlasting kingdom, the relation of sonship, and the superintendence of the temple (cf. Ps 2.)

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: Jehoiada and the people 2Ki 11:17 = 2Ch 23:3, a constitutional agreement to be the people of Yahweh.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: Hezekiah and the people 2Ch 29:10, a constitutional agreement to reform the worship.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: Josiah and the people 2Ki 23:3, a constitutional agreement to obey the book of the covenant.

definitions.title: j.
definitions.body: Ezra and the people Ezr 10:3, a constitutional agreement to put away foreign wives and observe the Law.

definitions.title: k.
definitions.body: the prophetic covenant, a divine promise through a series of prophets to establish a new constitution [[ברית חדשׁה]] Je 31:31, with new institutions and precepts Is 42:6, Is 49:8, Is 55:3, Is 59:21, Is 61:8, Je 31:31, Je 31:33, Je 32:40, Je 50:5, Ez Eze 16:60, Eze 16:62, Eze 20:37, Eze 34:25, Eze 37:26, Ho 2:20. In Is:Is 2 the Messianic servant is [[ברית עם]] Is 42:6, Is 49:8, cf. [[מלאך הברית]] Mal 3:1.

definitions.title: III.
definitions.body: Phrases.

covenant making: [[כרת ברית]] Ge 15:18, Ex 34:10, Ex 34:27 (J) Jos 24:25 (E) De 5:2, De 5:3, De 28:69, De 29:13, De 29:24, 1Ki 5:26, 2Ki 11:17, 2Ki 17:35, 2Ki 17:38, 2Ki 23:3, 2Ch 21:7, 2Ch 23:3, 2Ch 23:16, 2Ch 29:10, 2Ch 34:30, Ezr 10:3, Ne 9:8, Ps 50:5, Ps 89:4, Is 55:3, Is 61:8, Je 11:10, Je 31:31, Je 31:32, Je 31:33, Je 32:40, Je 34:13, Ez Eze 34:25, Eze 37:26, Ho 2:20; [[הקים ברית]] establish a covenant Ge 6:18, Ge 9:9, Ge 9:11, Ge 9:17, Ge 17:7, Ge 17:19, Ge 17:21, Ex 6:4 (P) Ez Eze 16:60, Eze 16:62, but confirm covenant Le 26:9 (?; H) De 8:18; [[נתן ברית]] Ge 17:2, Nu 25:12 (P); [[שׂם ברית]] 2Sa 23:5 (poet.); [[עבר בברית]] De 29:11; [[בא בברית]] 2Ch 15:12, Ez Eze 16:8; [[חוה ברית]] Ps 111:9; [[נשׂא ברית]] [[על פי]] Ps 50:16. (Cf. further on these Dr:J Ph xi. 1882, 210 ff.)

covenant keeping: on the part of man [[שׁמר ברית]] 1Ki 11:11, Ne 1:5, Ne 9:32, Ps 78:10, Ps 103:18, Ps 132:12, Da 9:4, [[נחר ברית]] De 33:9, Ps 25:10, [[מחזיקים]] [[בברית]] Is 56:4, Is 56:6; on the part of God [[זכר ברית]] Ge 9:15, Ge 9:16, Ex 2:24, Ex 6:5 (all P), Le 26:42, Le 26:42, Le 26:42 (H; on sf. cf. Di Ges:§ 128, 1 R b) v:Le 26:45 (H) Ps 105:8, Ps 106:45, Ps 111:5, 1Ch 16:15, Ez Eze 16:15, Ez Eze 16:60. Thus we have [[נאמנת]] Ps 89:29; [[ברית עולם]] Ge 9:16, Ge 17:7, Ge 17:13, Ge 17:18, Ge 17:19, Ex 31:16, Le 24:8, Nu 18:19, Nu 25:13 (P) 2Sa 23:5, (poet.) 1Ch 16:17 (= Ps 105:10) Is 24:5, Is 55:3, Is 61:8, Je 32:40, Je 50:5, Ez Eze 16:60, Eze 37:26; [[ברית מלח]] Le 2:13, 2Ch 13:5, 2Ch 21:7 (a cov't. with sacrificial meal and salt; on cov't. with salt in Arabia cf. We:Skizzen iii. 124); [[ברית שׁלום]] Nu 25:12 (P) Is 54:10, Ez Eze 34:25, Eze 37:26; [[הברית והחסד]] De 7:9, De 7:12, 1Ki 8:23 (= 2Ch 6:14) Ne 1:5, Ne 9:32, Da 9:4; [[ברית קדשׁ]] Da 11:28, Da 11:30; [[מסרת הברית]] Ez Eze 20:37.

covenant violation: [[עבר ברית]] De 17:2, Jos 7:11, Jos 7:15, Jos 23:16 (D) Ju Jdg 2:20, 2Ki 18:12, Ho 6:7, Ho 8:1; [[הפר ברית]] Ge 17:14, Le 26:15, Le 26:44 (H) De 31:16, De 31:20 (J) Ju Jdg 2:1, Is 24:5, Is 24:5, Je 11:10, Je 14:21, Je 31:32, Je 33:20, Je 33:21, Ez Eze 16:59, Eze 17:18, Eze 17:19, Eze 44:7, Zec 11:10; [[עזב ברית]] 1Ki 19:10, 1Ki 19:14, Je 22:9, Da 11:30; [[מאס ברית]] 2Ki 17:15; [[נאר ברית]] Ps 89:39; [[חלל ברית]] Ps 89:34, Mal 2:10; [[שׁקר בברית]] Ps 44:18; [[שׁכח ברית]] De 4:23, De 4:31, Je 50:5.
